website_summaries.verdict: Available in lots of fun colors, these headphones have good sound and work well for families with 2 or more kids.
pros: Flexible cord holds up to rough treatment
Sharing port lets 2 kids listen at once

customer_reviews.title: The sound stopped working 95 days after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to submit reviews a couple of times and Amazon keeps denying the review. I purchased these headphones and they died shortly after the 90 day return window. I reviewed the warranty information posted on the product web site and it is invalid as these are not manufactured by Snug, they are cheap knock offs. Click on the warranty link and call the phone number.
customer_reviews.author: Banana Man

customer_reviews.title: Need a great pair of corded headphones for your kid?
customer_reviews.text: The Good: -Comfortable fit for 6 year old and could easily be used for older kid -Folding design to take up less room -Has ability to hook another pair of headphones up via another audio cable -Comfortable fit -Volume limiting -Long audio cable The Bad: -None The Bottom Line: I got these for our 6 year old to use on the plane with his iPad and they were great. The headphones are comfortable and have a folding design to take up less room when packing. The headphones have the ability to hook another pair of headphones to these headphones (via a separate audio cable) so I was able to watch Blippi with my kid...Overall I would recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppaguy

customer_reviews.title: If you are debating between this and Lilgadgets choose Lilgadgets
customer_reviews.text: I got this headphone and the Lilgadgets to compare them for my 2boys. The Lilgadgets has clear sound and the feeling of the headphone is much better. The Snug is so much flimsier and the sound is terrible. I hope I just received a faulty item because Snug claims to “invent” this product and be much better than the Lilgadgets. Save yourself time and money and choose the Lilgadgets
customer_reviews.author: Citak

customer_reviews.title: The other toddlers will be jealous!
customer_reviews.text: These just arrived, but my first impression is that they're really nice little headphones. The materials are top notch, and the sound is great. The reviews about the volume level being too low concerned me, but trying them out myself they seem to be plenty loud. Makes me wonder if maybe the issues were related to something other than the headphones (connection, etc.) for this that we're having problems. When I opened these up, one of my friends joked "Baby's first Beats" :) The sound in the video is coming from the headphones. They seem plenty loud to me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and nice quality
customer_reviews.text: We needed headphones for my 7 yr old daughter as a school supplies requirement and just tested them with her, she loves the color and quality of voice. I like how they fit snugly on her ( she has a narrow head) and they are very cute. They are very reasonable priced yet look expensive. I will update as the school year progresses to see how they turn out.
customer_reviews.author: N. Khan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my 8 month old and will grow with her!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my 8 month old when we went on a plane trip from Florida to NY (2.5 hours). We used it so she could watch Baby Bum on her tablet. Honestly she is okay watching without sound, but I wanted to have the option. I love the fact that I can hook up a second pair or headphones to these so that 2 people can listen at a time. They fit her just fine, maybe a little big, but she had no issues with it. Some people complained about the sound, but for a little kid, I don't see it being an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my first grader!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these headphones for my first grader to use with her school Chromebook for distance learning. They've worked flawlessly for 6 weeks, and I've not heard one complaint about discomfort or volume. They also fold very small, so they're easy to store and transport. The color is vibrant, and she absolutely loves them because they are her favorite color, purple! I tested the sound and it is clear and crisp. Great for tablets, laptops, etc.
customer_reviews.author: The Messenger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man these headphones are great! My son is 17 months and we used them for the first time on a 5hr flight. He loved them! I love all the padding, the quality is fantastic. I love that I can switch which side the cord come out of and I especially love the durability of the cord. My son was chewing on it, pulling on it and it was prefect. I even was able to expand them and wear them when he fell asleep. These will be able to be used for years. Highly highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: AmyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are for very small children
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: 5 Star review: I did not return these, but instead gave them to my niece and nephew who are 4 and 5. They fit perfectly and love them so much we are ordering more. Original 4 Star review: I have no idea if these headphones are of good quality, they were WAY too small for my kids. These were bought for a 9 year old boy and an 8 year old girl, but they couldn't fit comfortably into them. The feature that caused me to buy these particular sets was the sharing feature. I do love that idea! I wish they had worked but we had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Great BUT sound only out of 1 ear. Stopped working in 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a month. We've tolerated just one side working period we bought two pairs both of them have the same issue period you can only hear out of one ear the print and image on the outside is very cute, the kids are really excited to use it. I really love how you can share the audio with a cable and bridge the two headsets. It's perfectly ideal for a car drive road trip and having the kids watch a movie in the back. However extremely unsatisfying that both headphones stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Suffering_Servant

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound quality - can't hear any voices.
customer_reviews.text: Will be returning these. Extended the Max size they are just big enough for my 2 year old (not even 2.5 yet...). But the main issue is the sound - you can't hear the voices. You can hear music/background noise but the voices themselves are so muted you cannot make them out. I had it up to full volume and tried multiple videos, if it's a song you can't hear the lyrics and if it's a movie you can't hear the voices.
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves loves loves these, and they are great, except they don't hold up very well. They look great and fit perfectly! We are on out third pair, two since Feb this year and the same problem with all of them, one side cuts out, then soon after dead. Customer service is great and they replaced the first set no issues, but I'm going to look for a more durable brand now.
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and great price
customer_reviews.text: My son has had his for 2 years now for school. He has used them several times a week for class for 2 school years and going into his third. Daughter just started kindergarten so i got her one as well (unicorn pattern) They have good cushioning on the head strap, and are comfortable to wear. They don't go overly loud, but still too loud personally when kids are watching videos. I just ask them to turn it down. The rubberized finish gives it a quality feel. $15 for at least 2 years so far is hard to beat
customer_reviews.author: ryanjv

customer_reviews.title: Headphones do not last!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter initially loved these headphones. Within a few months, the sound starting going in and out. She had to adjust the cord or hold them a certain way to hear from them. I contacted the company twice and received no response form them. I also bought Square Trade protection on these. Since the headphones stopped working within the first year, their warranty does not apply. What a waste of money and time!
customer_reviews.author: Rita T

customer_reviews.title: 1st pair working 3 years and counting. Bought 2 more!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. I got my first pair 3 years ago for my oldest daughter to keep at school in Kindergarten. Her first pair STILL work and she is going into 3rd grade! I KNEW with my twins going into Kindergarten that I would be buying these same headphones. The cord can go on either ear and the cushion is great and comfortable for the kids. The ears can pull down to adjust for size as they grow. The durability for the price is unbeatable!! Loyal customer!
customer_reviews.author: Kate B.

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable, light
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these headphones. He's 5. It's comfortable, light, soft and the cord will NOT wrap around on him easily. I purchased this specifically for flying and it worked great. He requests for them sometimes at home as well.
customer_reviews.author: MichB

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME - Great value! Mom approved.
customer_reviews.text: I've now ordered 4 pairs of these for my kids. I am impressed with them! One cool thing I didn't realize is that you can plug them into each other!! So one child can be plugged into the device and you can hook the second kid's headphones into the first headphone and both kids can hear on devices with one output! We love that! The range of colors is great - makes it easy to tell which pair belongs to which child. When we need additional/new headphones I will come straight back for these.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: I love them for my 7 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter destroys headphones...I say this to express how happy am to have these headphones still working. I'm truly amazed! 3 weeks in and no problems at all. Now I will say the noise cancelation is incredible on these. I called out for my daughter and nothing...I went to her room and called her from the door way. Silence lol. I tapped her on her shoulder and finally she sees me. Yeah. Your kid won't hear you...at all lol. Get these earphones.
customer_reviews.author: autobond28

customer_reviews.title: Small ear covers
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of these, one for my 3 year old and the other for my 5 year old. The adjustable band fits them both great with plenty of room to grow. The part that covers the ears however is TINY. It barely fits over their little ears and I imagine isn't going to be comfortable for much longer. I do love that I can easily plug them into eachother and they are compatible with our Kindle Fires so I decided to keep them. Just disappointed that they won't likely fit over their ears comfortably long term.
customer_reviews.author: DiscoYoga

customer_reviews.title: Buy another set.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. That is where it ends. If you are sitting in the livingroom, your child will hear just fine. If you have a vehicle like mine, with a lot of road noise (mud tires and being a jeep...they aren't quiet), the kids won't hear anything. I know it said volume safety or whatever, but they are a bit too quiet. Im heading on a road trip, so I am out of time to order another set from someone else but I will be buying another set along the way.
customer_reviews.author: Permatan

customer_reviews.title: I like them but..
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones in blue and green. The color was nice, great cushion for the ears and my boys did love them at first. But if purchasing, get yourself an extra male to male wire on here. I got this on April 9th. Its already April 17th, and the wires are already making a static-y noise. My kids are barely able to hear anything now. It’s like you’re watching a show and someone keeps pressing the mute button.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Morales

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: The look is sleek and matches his case perfectly. There is an option to plug the audio cord in either left or right earphone but I noticed that when plugged into the right phone jack it didn’t play on both sides, meanwhile it played fine when plugged into the other jack. Maybe just a one time glitch ?also my son has longer hair and as such the phones slide off every so often but not enough to cause concern. Overall an ideal purchase for a kid. Price is reasonable, the look is modern and comfortable for wear.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Great for our kindergartner!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great! They don't quite fit my adult head, but I did pop them on to listen to the sound. The sound quality is fantastic. Nice and clear no static. They fit our little lady great with a little room to grow. I love how they fold up and store easy in her backpack. We purchased these for tablet time at school. The cord is quite beefy which makes me feel better since they are going to be used and abused by a 6 year old at school. All in all I am super happy with this purchase and our daughter loves them too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for a smaller child
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones for my kids to share while we are at home. They are a good value for the money. My only issue with them, is they are on the smaller size. They fit my 2 year old well. My 5 year old likely wont be able to wear them for longer than a few months, and they are way too small for my older children. I do really like that they have an extra audio output, so you can link another set of headphones to them and listen to the same device.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyto2+

customer_reviews.title: Good but only lasts a few months ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 2 kids. They worked for about 8 months then stopped working. We bought new ones and those only lasted 6 months. We’ve bought 4 now and all of them stopped working after several months. We even bought 2 adaptor cords for it thinking it was that but it was the actual headphones. While they worked it was cool because they could share one tablet by plugging each other’s headphones into the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughters love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 3 yrs and 5 yrs old granddaughters. My 3 yrs old granddaughter is very small for her age and these fit them great and they both love them and the unicorn design. With the 2 of them watching something on Disney plus or YouTube kids or just playing one of their games. Then you have my daughter on her online classes and me watching tv we need headphones for the girls.
customer_reviews.author: c.iriguchi

customer_reviews.title: Great!! I’m happy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pair of headphones for my kids (3&5). The sizes are great. The matte colors are amazing. Kids loved them and use them constantly. After purchasing these I had a minor issue but I’m very please how quickly I got a response from the seller. They were absolutely on top of it and the response time was great! I think this company really cares about the consumer. I would definitely recommend these!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: April V Ayala

customer_reviews.title: We love these for our toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two pairs of these and both have worked wonderful. I put off my review to see how these held up. I read reviews about these not working well but both pairs for kids have held up wonderfully. I recommend these for toddler age children. I also like that the cord pulls away from the head phones. I think this is a great safety feature when being used by young children.
customer_reviews.author: Cally

customer_reviews.title: Both broken within a couple of weeks, getting replacements, we will see how it goes.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for distance learning and have had them a couple of weeks. The cords are unraveling on both sets, exposing the wires, one headset broke and you can only hear out of one side, the other set you can’t hear out of either side. I know they weren’t the most expensive headsets but they only use these for about 90 minutes a day then they are put away so I’m disappointed that they are falling apart/breaking so fast! We did a return and they are sending new ones so we will see how those do.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: You can plug into these headphones directly to evaluate volume or watch together!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our first family vacation with airplane ride. I like them because I can plug by headphones in to the opposite ear to make sure the volume is appropriate for toddler ears. Also, I could watch shows on the iPad with him and listen-along / monitor content by being plugged in. We could have also done this with a splitter. But this was so convenient and easy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: My 4 kids each have a pair
customer_reviews.text: These really work well for the kids on their iPads. We had one pair that one of my kids damaged the cord, but found that you can easily substitute any other AC headphone cord you may have around for the one that comes with it and it works fine. We've had ours for quite some time now and they're still in one piece, which, considering our kids are 3, 4, 7 and 9 says something.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: These are great for kids. We went on a trip and they were able to connect their headphones and listen to the same movie on their Kindle. They seem to be pretty sturdy; my destructive 3-year-old has yet to break his! They are easy to use and fold up nicely for storage. I will definitely be purchasing more of these for my other kids in the near future. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: These didn't even make it one plane ride. I plugged them in before we left the house to test and they were great.... Then I plugged then into our iPad on the plane and they just didn't work. Tried several more times and still no sound. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaci Weirich

customer_reviews.title: Great fit but not crazy about the cord 😞
customer_reviews.text: They’re really cute and they fit great however within a weeks of having them the wire popped through the fabric coating on the cord and it’s now bent... It seemed to happen rather easily though which is what warrants my three star... otherwise great sound and fits nicely On my four-year-old’s head with room to grow As long as the Cord holds up
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite headphones for my kids. They are durable, can switch which side the cord connects to, and can even link sets together. They fold up nicely for traveling, too. I also like that the volume has a lower maximum to prevent damaging ear drums, but it does sometimes make it difficult for my kids to hear in noisier places like airplanes.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey AC

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves her big girl head phones!! These are super cute and well made. I love that there are two AUX jacks- one on each side of the ear phones for sharing 2+ kids to one tablet or iPod! Great idea! Love that there is a lot of cushion around the top so they can be worn for at least 30+ min without getting uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Cord stopped working after about a month.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, purchased for my son and almost purchased another one for my daughter til the cord stopped working after a month. We switched it out with an extra beats cord we have and the actual headset itself works just fine. May still purchase another just because the headsets can connect for shared audio.
customer_reviews.author: Broke 💔 Love

customer_reviews.title: 1 year lifespan
customer_reviews.text: These headphones we're great for my son for the short life they had. My oldest (10) is extremely meticulous, sometimes overly careful, with his things and they still look knew. But after a little over a year the audio is going out. I had purchased a second pair for my youngest (8) who is not a careful child and his pair died less than a year into ownership. I assumed at the time that he must have broken them but now I am not so sure. They were great while they lasted but I had hoped to get more than a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L Robison

customer_reviews.title: These are much better! I love that they fold
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my son's Batman headphones. These are much better! I love that they fold, adjust, and are a little flexible. They seem to be very comfortable since my son wears them all the time. The cord is fabric covered and can be inserted into either ear. I would/will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price! Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: These are terrific headphones and perfect for the kids to use at school with their iPads. The cord completely disconnects for easy storage. The box they come in is a great storage package. They can plug into each other (I bought two) so the kids can watch the same thing together. The materials are all high quality! The colors were true to the ad. Bonus is the straight jack on the cord so, the plug actually goes into the jack on the iPad that’s inside a protective case and adds bulk that other bent jacks could not surpass.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two sets of these headphones for my kiddos last year before we went on vacation. A few months ago they stopped working. I wasn't sure if it was the headset itself or the cord that connects the headphones to the computer. I contacted them to ask where I could find a new cord to test out. It's hard to know online which cords will fit with what headsets. Within days Snug sent me two sets of new headphones to my home. The customer service is outstanding, and I'm really glad I chose them over other competitors. Now, I have headphones that work making travel easier with toddlers in tow. The company and the headphones rock!
customer_reviews.author: Amber R.

customer_reviews.title: They have great sound, very clear
customer_reviews.text: We bought these ahead of a trip we’ll be taking on planes, hoping that our 2 year old would be used to them before the flight. Opened them today and she LOVES them! All she wants it to wear them and watch her shows on the tablet instead of the TV. They have great sound, very clear. I was worried that they wouldn’t be loud enough considering they’re made not to get too loud but it’s not a problem. Can’t wait to by a second pair when our newborn is old enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: They’re awesome for my 4 year old daughter and her iPad. I love how they fold for easy storage. They’re just overall a great product especially for kids. Adults would probably want something of better quality but kids don’t really understand that concept lol. So for now they’re great! And they adjust really well too.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie S.

customer_reviews.title: Best for age 1-3
customer_reviews.text: They are smaller then they appear in the picture. I purchased them for my 5 and 7 year old, and they are almost too small. I would not recommend them for that age group.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids older than 6 years old
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pair of these in pink and aqua for my daughters. My girls are almost 6 and 9 years old. They fit my 6 year old fine but they didn't work for my 9 year old. They were all we had for an eight hour car trip so she used them but they hurt her ears because they were too tight. The top of her ears were red at the end of the trip. My 9 year old is small, she wears a size 6X in clothes to give an idea of her size. I would say these are great for kids ages 6 and under but not older than that.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones if looking for some to go along with the children’s  HD Kindle Fire
customer_reviews.text: We bought these headphones to go with my 4 yr olds HD Kindle Fire tablet. They work perfectly together, not to mention the blue headphones almost match the blue case perfectly and look great when using them together. I was very pleased with the sound quality and how well they fit my child’s head. They also fold up and fit right in the diaper bag alongside the Kindle, which is great since we pretty much don’t leave home without the 2 items together. All in all a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee bell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headphones and really fun designs
customer_reviews.text: My son loved picking out the design of his headphones and I love that they fold up and can be put away in a compact way. He is the only one with this design at school so it makes it easy for him to know these are his. He loves wearing them while he does school work or plays games. Good buy and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Limehouse

customer_reviews.title: They work great... while they last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 4 sets of headphones and all 4 kids have complained that their headphones no longer work. They worked amazing for a couple months then out of no where no longer play sound. I am a minimal electronics usage mom so when I say these head phones don’t get used daily or for any more than 2 hours on occasion I mean it. There were great reviews and each kid got to pick their own colors so it seemed like a great investment. 4 months after buying the first two and 2 months after buying the second two I’m very disappointed that none of them work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth maybe better
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a 3 year old to use with her tablet. They seem to work fine for her and if they break they were not expensive so it won’t be a big loss. I wouldn’t buy corded earphones for her again, I’d do Bluetooth because the first thing that happened as she was trying to take them on and off is they got tangled around her neck. Lesson learned there. With parental supervision she will be fine but it’s something I didn’t think of.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Hurts my daughter's ears
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and the volume control is fine. However, after less than an hour of wearing them my daughter was complaining they hurt her ears and her ears were bright red. She's only 6 and doesn't have a large head or anything. For me, this was a waste of money because she can't wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy new headphones for my son because he chewed on the cord and they broke. These have a nylon cord which i think will work better for him. They fold which i didn't think would make a difference but its a nice feature. The ear part is VERY padded. Another very cool feature. They are perfect for us so far. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jts

customer_reviews.title: Can hear audio just fine on plane
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones specifically for my 3 year old to watch movies during flights. Some reviewers reported difficulty hearing audio through these on planes. We didn't have any problems. I tried them first to make sure he would be able to hear the audio, and the sound came through just fine despite the noise from the plane. I like that there is a volume limit, so I don't need to worry about damage to his hearing.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: WERE Great for my 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: These were great headphones! They havegreat sound, my 3 year old who is very sensitive to different things seems to love these headphones. My son has a tendency to put the cord in his mouth and I've noticed it coming a little frayed, but it's still working and he's using them. I also love how they fold up conveniently! HOWEVER- In less than a year they were broke. It started with one side popping off, my husband fixed it, and now out of nowhere starting at the beginning of the year, the sound just stopped working. Would NOT recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MrsSpj

customer_reviews.title: Cute and helpful
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for my little guy (2). He loves them and they are perfect in size for his small head. They fold up easily when not in use and you can put the cord in either side of the headphones. The color matched perfectly with his neon green iPad case. The online description fits the product I received. Happy mom!
customer_reviews.author: Beautifulbutterfly

customer_reviews.title: Work great for 1 year old.
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our almost two year to use to listen to music on a plane ride. They fit perfectly and stayed on without any issues. They seemed very comfortable and she was happy to wear them. I expect they will last a long time as they seem durable and well-made. Volume doesn't get too loud either so we dint have to worry about her accidentally adjusting it and hurting her ears. We are very happy with these headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two headphones and was happy with the initial purchase but after 4 months neither of the headphones are working properly. The sound is muffled and the kids can't hear anything. Reached out to the seller and waiting to hear back. I can't believe they lasted such a short time. My kids are are 7 & 9 and the headphones aren't misused, the cords are in good condition. I just can't believe they both don't work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Isela Ortega,Isela Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Not even 6 months later and the headphones don't work. There seems to be some type of short in them. It's very aggravating because they were not the cheapest and here I am ordering another pair. I would pass on these. Also, the cord detaching seemed like a good idea. However, it's very easy to misplace the cord since it detaches. Overall, bad buy. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella H. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was 1 when I purchased these and the smallest setting was perfect. They definitely help with cancelling out the noise but I also love that the volume does not go so high as to hurt her ears. I can also tell that she'll be able to use them through the years because, at their largest, they ALMOST fit my head. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: JenJen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, I bought again.
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought two pair of these in green and turquoise to go with the kindle kids tablet. They have work well for my 2 and 8 year olds. I love that the cords separate from the set and that the headsets can be linked together so they can both hear at different volumes on a recent road trip. We started with one pair and picked up the second pair at Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: FoolishFeathers

customer_reviews.title: Bought...broke...then replacement was broken
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for xmas for my son. They worked for about 4 months and slowly stopped working. First you could only hear music and no voices, then nothing. Received replacement under warranty. Plugged them in and again, no voices only music. My daughters headphones worked fine in my son's kindle so I know it's not the tablet. Not worth getting another replacement. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Angie N.

customer_reviews.title: These are louder than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 year old to help keep his volume level down but they are louder than I expected. They are nice headphones and are holding up well so far. If the cord is plugged into the wrong ear, there is no sound so keep that in mind. One of the holes is strictly to add an additional headset to what's already being listened to.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sneed

customer_reviews.title: Definitely happy!
customer_reviews.text: These were a price for my 2 year old grand daughter. They are super cute and well made. I love the feel of them. The size is perfect too. Usually they are made too big even though they are suppose to bbw for children. I'm thinking about getting another pair for my other granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: They fit great on my 3 yr old. They can extend about two inches on each side and comes with a gray rope like aux cord. I don't think these would fit an older child tho as I did have to extend them a little on my toddler as you can see in the picture. But they are super cute & good quality.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for kids!
customer_reviews.text: After trying several different brands these headphones have lasted! We loved them so much we purchased a second pair. The first pair we’ve had for over a year. This is unheard of as my kids can be pretty hard headphones. Work great and fit both my kids ages 8 &10. Love that they can connect them to each other and both listen to one divide at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great for toddlers. My child still has some growing room, they were a bit big for her because she’s already very petite. They have several adjustment options and the volume control feature is a plus. I also like the detachable and durable chord.
customer_reviews.author: Night Rain

customer_reviews.title: These are great headphones for kids
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones for kids! Love that it has volume control. They fit nicely on a kid's head without being as bulky as other brands. The adjustable sides allow for kids to use these for awhile. This is the second pair we ordered and I wish these came with a storage bag like the other ones we have.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Nice little earphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice for kids. They fit both my 5 and 7 year old just fine. Sound is clear and true, not much bass, but that's OK! Not much noise cancelation, but that's OK because I need to get their attention at some point! 😂 So far, so good and my kids and me!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Positive update with replacement sent when No longer work after a month
customer_reviews.text: 10/5/20 Update: I am changing my rating as I reached out to Customer Service and they were GREAT! The troubleshot with me and ended up sending me a replacement since something was defective. Appreciate service like that!! Unfortunately I bought these and they were used for only a month and no longer work! There is absolutely no wear and tear and were used correctly. Hopefully this company will stand by this and send new ones. I love the product and they worked well for the month they worked!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Van Beek

customer_reviews.title: For kids five and under
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these, too small for my kids. The area that covers the ears are even smaller than normal headphones which is great for some but my six year old said it was too small. The volume was good and they looked very well made though. Just for the younger kiddos
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Terry

customer_reviews.title: Sound went out fast. / poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Saddened that by the beginning of the second week of school my daughters teacher sent them home because they no longer worked. They’re kept in a safe place while not being used and only used for about an hour every other day when the students are given tablet time. I meant to contact amazon but just haven’t had the spare time to do so. My daughter did absolutely love the color of them and they fit her comfy. She is five.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Musgrave

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 20 month old to use with her tablet on the plane. This is a wonderful product! It's very comfortable and is able to adjust as she grows. I like the double audio feature so I can plug my headphones in and listen too. The headphones fold up and stores nicely in our travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Stark

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set and two others like it for my grandchildren, ages 3, 4, and 6. They are perfect for small heads and the volume is regulated so that they can't be turned up too loudly. They also seem to be tough. I think they will last a while!
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 2 year old. They were a huge help on the airplane! She wore them for 4 flights, almost the entire time. They fit her great and must have been comfortable because she wore them the whole time and she is super finicky about most things!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Connectable for shared viewing/listening
customer_reviews.text: Well made, and fold up well for transport. We bought a set for each of our sons (2 and 4) and it’s perfect because you can plug one set into the other and they can watch the same tablet. Sound is definitely good enough for the, and doesn’t get too loud. Very happy with them do far.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Baird

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: At one point, I thought it was broken. It was actually needing the cord at the ear phone to be pushed in more! So far, incredibly durable. Travels in a backpack daily with my child. He uses it on his tablet, a computer, etc. Fits his head perfectly, protects his little ears. Good set.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new headphones. I was very surprised with the quality and the texture, they are very soft. I was a little skeptical with these at first because of the reviews about the product snapping where it adjust. But haven't had any issues so far with that problem. My daughter takes pretty good care of her things, so unless she rough handles or throws around her headphones i dont see why they should break easily. I would definitely purchase these again or reccomend
customer_reviews.author: BossQueen

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love These
customer_reviews.text: My kids really love these. I actually put them away and bring them out only as needed - son was using the cord to tie up his sister (??) and I actually like keeping an "ear" on what they are watching. We used recently on an airplane and they were perfect. Fit my 2-year-old and 5-year-old equally well.
customer_reviews.author: kpg

customer_reviews.title: Eight Year Old Approved
customer_reviews.text: They don't get very loud, which is good to protect sensitive eardrums. The do cancel out noise, because unless we pull then away from her ear, she can't hear us at all. They are sturdy and have lasted well through school and recreational use.
customer_reviews.author: E. Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my tyrannosaurus two year old. She has yet to break them. They feel surprising heavy duty, and i like that the wire can plug into either side, oh and i like how it has an removable audio cable so it can b replaced. Byt so far its lasted. Thanks to the braided cover im sure
customer_reviews.author: tonyhett

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these for kids. We kept buying new headphones because the kids would break the wire on them. This brand, you can replace the cord with standard stereo 3.5mm 2 ended cords. It's already saved buying completely new sets of headphones. Both ear pods have a 3.5mm jack. So you can plug another set of headphones into them to share sound!
customer_reviews.author: chefstef612

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is our second set of these headphones and while the price is good, the product is not. I purchased this pair at the end of July and 4 months later they don’t work. They only get used on special occasions in the vehicle when traveling long distances and are not used often. We have a special case for them that they are stored in and still, the same issue of wiring has made this pair not work. I would not recommend this product based on the quality of two different sets we have owned. So now, I will have to find a different pair for replacement yet again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: Had worked well but now the sound is distant and 'squiggled'. Checked connections and replaced patch cord with one I had laying around, Same result. Should have made it more than 2 months of light-moderate use. Too late to return. 2 stars because it was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect headphones!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have two pairs of these each. One for school and the other at home and they are absolutely perfect. They fit my 3 year old and my 6 year old perfectly and are comfortable headphones. The headphones even fit me as well. The cord is nice as well because it does not bend and is flexible. I love these headphones and I would definitely recommend these to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Glenn

customer_reviews.title: First pair 2 years old and going strong!  Second pair not working after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair we've bought. The first pair bought 2 years ago still work fine. The are durable, comfortable and Iike that they fold up. We bought a second pair a few months ago so each kid would have a pair, only used a handful of times, and now volume is so low you can hear about nothing. Really disappointed because I was so happy with the first pair.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Carnahan

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 sets of headphones for our kids (2 and 6). The fit is fine, I like that they fold. The best part was being able to connect them together. HOWEVER, one pair has quit working after only 3 months of limited use (we maybe use a few times a week). I am disappointed that the longevity of the product was so short. And now I have a second pair that I expect to also break, and we can no longer connect the two for ease of sharing a device.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Cords short out - 6 pairs, every single one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 for each of my kids. They stopped working pretty quickly but overall for the price, I liked them. Bought 3 more. SAME THING happened. Then I realized it was the cords. Ordered new cords from another company and have not had an issue since. PLEASE USE HIGHER QUALITY CORDS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rick F.

customer_reviews.title: Soft but small
customer_reviews.text: A little small even for kids, my 4 year old is pretty close to fully extended. But incredibly cute and soft. She has sensory issues so I was extremely relieved to feel their softness! I would not recommend past the age of 6 for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jeslyn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by the cute designs
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased two pairs of these headphones and both stopped working a couple months after I purchased them. I thought maybe I just got a faulty pair the first time so I thought I’d give them another try. Fail! Don’t be fooled by the cute designs.
customer_reviews.author: Damesha Craig

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: **EDIT** (these are actually really nice headphones and the size is great) These are such cute headphones but they are way smaller than what I thought they’d be. They are for small children, pre-k and kindergarten. My son is in 1st grade and they are small on him and he’s not a big kid at all.
customer_reviews.author: S.M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were the perfect solution to some of my daughters educational games -- that just get annoying to everyone in the house after a while. I love that they limit the volume. She loves that they are comfortable and are covered in unicorns! #DadForTheWin
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: Loved at first, but stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Loved these for my some because they were so easy to fold and pack on road trips, then suddenly the sound became distorted and stayed that way. Not sure if an internal wire came loose or what but after about 5months if infrequent use they were useless. Super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunatley didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to purchase these at the beginning of the school year (August) and have them unusable by February. The teacher had to email me to let me know that they are now completely useless for my son in class and that the sound barely comes out of one side and the other side no longer works at all. I know kids are rough sometimes, but these are stored at school and only used during the school day so not super hard usage either. Until they stopped working, my son seemed perfectly happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Familyof4

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my 7 year old because we knew if we bought her regular headphones she would turn the sound up too loud and hurt her ears. So far, they are still in one piece which is a lot to say. It was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy West

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I got a bad set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of the same headphones (one pink, one blue) for my little ones who are 2 & 4. Unfortunately, the blue set didn't even last a month before there was no more sound coming through.
customer_reviews.author: w8onhim74

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out for us
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the pair I received had one side with no sound. I am returning them and have decided to go with something else since my daughter needs them for school and we don't have time to go through all this again if another pair were defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Brunk

customer_reviews.title: Plug in multiple headsets with no splitter
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use on a flight with my toddler so that he could watch cartoons on my phone and we could both listen. I’ve tested it out and it works perfectly. I plugged his headset into the phone and my earbuds plug into his headset and we were both able to hear the audio. They also fold up to make them easier to pack, but the folding doesn’t make much difference in size. This is the perfect headset if you want to use multiple sets of headsets without using a separate splitter.
customer_reviews.author: Wazzock

customer_reviews.title: Great sharing feature with second jack
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Adjusts for myself, my six year old, it my for year old! I really like the feature of being able to put two headphones on one device without an adaptor for the device!! Best feature for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my son a year ago and they made it through all of first grade. Anyone that’s been in a classroom and seen how these things get thrown in a bin and tossed around knows how awesome it is to have a pair last and still work great. Bought a second set for my daughter for long car trips.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lehman

customer_reviews.title: They don’t last long (2 months or less)
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY disappointed. I bought these for my son 2 months ago and I’ve already had to replace the chord and the headphones are still glitching. The volume in the headphones is significantly lower in one ear than the other. But I guess you get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair we've bought of these because my son's school requires he have a pair to keep there and we still want to have a pair at home. They're great quality, comfortable for me big-headed 5 year old, and have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

product_meta.title: Snug Play+ Kids Headphones Volume Limiting and Audio Sharing Port (Blue)
feature_bullets: Features a sharing port on every set - Connect one side of these kids headphones to your media device then connect the other side to a second set of headphones to allow a daisy chain of kids to all listen at once!
Volume automatically limited to protect your childÍs ears - The Snug Play+ childrens headphones have a built-in volume limiting feature to save the eardrums of young kids.
Perfect size and fit for children - These headphones are lightweight and feature soft, comfortable earpads. Recommended for children ages 3-8.
Premium sound quality - Featuring 40mm drivers that provide a range of 20Hz to 20kHz, your kids will never be lacking for sound as they enjoy a complete audio experience.
Made with high quality, durable materials these headphone are built to last and withstand the rough play of kids

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars6,604 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #287 in On-Ear Headphones#350 in Over-Ear Headphones
